63759.「……今 人と話す気分じゃないんだ。\n 悪いけど ひとりにしてくれるかな。:
Sorry, but I don't feel like talking right
now. I'd like to be left alone.

63760.「……おや。リゼロッタから\n 僕の頼みを 聞いてくれって 言われたのかい？: Oh, Lieselotte asked you to do me a favor?

63761.「じつは トゥーラを ずっと練習していたら\n 弦が 切れてしまってさ。\n 弾:
Actually, while I was practicing, one of my
strings broke, so I couldn't play...

63762.「いつもなら 予備の弦を持っているんだけど\n 僕のかばんの中に しまったまま\:
I usually have spare string with me, but I
left it in my bag with my dad.

63763.「キミが 父さんの持ってる かばんを\n ここに届けてくれるなら 修理もできるけ:
If you could find my dad's bag for me I'd be
able to fix it, but... I don't think that's
possible...

63764.「……それにしても 父さんと母さんは\n いったい どこに行ったんだろう？\n:
But where did Mom and Dad go? We were
supposed to come to Celed together.

63765.「……トゥーラの弦が 切れてしまって\n 弾くことが できないんだ。:
I can't play my Torban because the strings are
broken...

63766.「父さんが持っている 予備の弦が入ったかばんを\n キミが ここに届けてくれるな:
My dad has a bag with spare strings in it that
you could deliver to me so I could fix it, but
I don't think that's possible.

63767.「……それにしても 父さんと母さんは\n いったい どこに行ったんだろう？\n:
But where did Mom and Dad go? We were
supposed to come to Celed together.

63768.「……おや？\n もしかして セリクのファンの方ですか？:
...Oh? Are you one of Selik's fans, by any
chance?

63769.「こんな遠い所まで わざわざ……。\n さあ どうぞ 会っていってください。:
It seems you've come a long way... Please,
come and see him.

63770.「息子は かつて グランゼドーラ王国で\n トゥーラの名手として 人気を集めてい:
He was once a renowed Torban player in Gran
Zedora Kingdom, but those days are sadly
long gone.

63771.「はるばる 入院先まで お見舞いに来てくださる\n あなたのような 熱心なファン:
I didn't realize he still had fans devoted
enough to come visit him in the hospital...

63772.「ほら セリク。\n あなたに お客さんよ……。: Hey, Selik... you have a visitor...

63773.「この子は 身体の端から 少しずつ\n 石化してしまう難病を わずらっていて\n:
He's stricken with an incurable disease that
causes him to petrify little by little... he's
been this way for some time.

63774.「いつか グランゼドーラの音楽祭で\n 優勝するのが夢だと言って がんばっていた:
He worked so hard, dreaming of one day winning
the Gran Zedora Music Festival... so why our
Selik, of all people...?

63775.「この おぞましい病気が治療できたとしても\n 息子の指が 動くようになる保証は:
Even if this horrific disease is curable,
there's no guarantee his fingers would work
the same ever again...

63776.「その道中 ついに リャナ荒涼地帯の山道で\n 意識を失ってしまい\n それ以来:
On the road, he ended up fainting around the
Lyana Desolate Area and hasn't woken up
since.

63777.「しかも この子が大事にしていた かばんも\n 魔物に奪われてしまうし\n まっ:
And that bag that he had treasured so much was
stolen by a monster... It's just a series of
terrible events...

63778.「え…… そのかばんが どうなったかですって？\n リャナ荒涼地帯の <%sEV:
Huh? What happened to the bag? It was snatched
by a Bad Hare in the Lyana Desolate Area.
But why...?

63779.「そろそろ 検査のお時間です。\n どうぞ お引き取りください。:
It's time for his check up. Please exit the
room.

63780.「……おっと 時間のようですね。\n この子も お客さんが来ると うれしいだろう:
Oops, looks like it's time to go... I'm sure
he's happy to have visitors, so please come
and visit again, won't you?

63782.「ああっ それは 僕のかばんじゃないか！\n 僕の両親は いったい どこにいたん:
Oh, that's my bag! But where are my
parents...?

63783.「……まあ トゥーラさえ直せれば\n そんなこと どうだっていいか。\n さあ:
Well... as long as I can fix my Torban, I
don't really care. Can you please give the
bag to me?<yesno><close>

63784.「……トゥーラが 弾けないと\n 僕は 生きていけないよ。\n お願いだから か:
I'm nothing without my Torban... I'm begging
you, please give it to me.<yesno><close>

63786.「ありがとう。これで やっと\n トゥーラの修理に とりかかれるよ。\n さて…:
Thank you. Now I can finally get to work on
fixing this...

63787.「ふふっ。すっかり 元通りさ。\n それじゃ さっそく……。: Heh. Good as new. I'll start right away...

63788.「どうやら セリクのトゥーラは\n 無事に 直ったみたいですわね。\n <pc>:
Looks like Selik's Torban was fixed. Thanks
for you help again, <pc>.

63789.「ねえ セリク。\n ちょっと お話があるから\n 高台の教会の２階まで 来てく:
Hey, Selik. Can you come upstairs to the High
Church for a minute?

63790.「とても 大事なお話ですから\n <pc>さんも ぜひ いらしてください。\n:
It's pretty important, so I'd like you to
come, too. I'll be waiting.

63791.「トゥーラの練習が したかったのに……。\n 大事な話って なんだろう？:
I just wanted to keep practicing... what's so
important to talk about?

63793.「へへっ あとは 主役だけだな！: Hehe. Now we just need the man of honor!

63797.「へへっ。びっくりしただろ？\n ずっと ナイショにしてたんだぜ！:
Hehe, were you surprised? We've been keeping
this a secret!

63798.「女王様が あなたのために\n パーティーをしようって 言ってね。\n みんなで:
Our queen said she wanted to throw a party
for you, so we've been secretly setting it
up.

63799.「わぁ…… すごい！\n これ みんな キミたちが用意したのかい？:
Wow... amazing! You guys prepared all this
for me?

63800.「自分でお菓子を作るなんて はじめてだったから\n おいしくできたか 自信ないけ:
It was the first time I made sweets by
myself, so I'm not sure if I did a good job...
But everyone here helped me.

63801.「それから あなたに\n プレゼントも ありますのよ。: Also... we have a present for you.

63802.「このロザリオは セレドの町の……。\n 子供の国の一員としての 絆の証ですわ。:
This rosary is a testament to our bond as
members of this town... the Kingdom of
Children!

63803.「……これも キミたちの 手作りなのかい？: Did you guys make this too?

63804.「ご両親がいなくて つらい時もあると思うけれど\n そんな時は このロザリオを見:
I know that its hard without your parents
right now... but I want you to be able to
think of us when you look at that rosary.

63805.「この絆がある限り あなたは\n いつだって 私たちの大切な仲間よ。:
As long as we have this bond, you'll always be
a precious companion to us.

63806.「ありがとう……。こんなに 心のこもった\n もてなしを受けたのは 生まれて は:
Thank you... I've never received such
heartfelt hospitality in my life.

63807.「みんなへの 感謝のしるしに\n 一曲 プレゼントさせてもらうよ。:
As a token of my gratitude, I would like to
play a song for all of you.

63808.「ありがとう みんな。\n こんな 晴れ晴れとした気持ちで\n トゥーラを弾くの:
Thanks, everyone. It's been so long since
I was able to play with such a refreshed
feeling.

63809.「僕は つい最近まで 手足の先から\n だんだん石化してしまうという\n おぞま:
Until recently, I was suffering from a
horrifying disease that gradually petrifies me
from the tips of my hands and feet.

63810.「トゥーラを弾くどころか 立つこともできなくて\n 僕に こんな運命を与えた神様:
I couldn't even stand up, let alone play my
Torban... I spent my days cursing whoever
gave me this horrible fate.

63811.「……でも こっちの世界に来たら\n そんな病気は 跡形もなく 消えさっててね。:
But when I came here, that illness just up
and vanished... I could play the Torban
again.

63812.「なぁ…… 僕って\n 本当は 死んでるんだろう？: Hey... I'm... actually dead, aren't I?

63813.「……やっぱり そうか。\n グランゼドーラの音楽祭で 優勝する夢は\n もう:
...I knew it. I guess my dream of winning the
Gran Zedora Music Festival won't come true
after all...

63815.「でも そんなこと どうでもいいよ。\n 病気で苦しんで 指先も動かせない人生よ:
But I don't care. I'd rather be here playing
lots of music than being sick and not being
able to move my fingers at all.

63816.「僕の演奏で よろこんでくれる人もいるし\n これ以上の幸せは ないよ。\n み:
You guys are happy with my performance, and
nothing could make me happier. Thank you,
everyone, for what you did today!

63817.「こちらこそ すばらしい演奏を ありがとう。\n さあ おやつも たくさんあるこ:
Thank you so much for your amazing
performance. Now that we have plenty of
snacks, let's enjoy today to the fullest!

63818.「おかげさまで セリクの歓迎パーティーは\n 無事に 終わりましたわ。\n さあ:
Thanks to you, Selik's welcome party went
perfectly. Please take this!

63819.「彼は 自分の死に 気づいていたんですね……。\n ちょっと おどろきましたけれ:
I was surprised that he was aware he was
really dead... but I'm relieved that he didn't
seem too depressed about it.

63820.「ところで 向こうのセレドの町で\n セリクのご両親に お会いしたようですわね。:
By the way, I heard that you met Selik's
parents in the other Celed. How were they
doing...?

63821.<pc>は 真のレンダーシアにある\nセレドの町で見てきたことを 説明した。:
<pc> described what he had
seen in Celed of the true Lendersia.

63822.「えっ……！？ 向こうのセレドの町にも\n セリクが いたですって！？: What...?! Selik is also in that Celed, too?!

63823.「施療院で 意識を失ったまま？\n それじゃあ セリクは\n まだ 生きているの:
He's unconscious in the hospital? Does that
mean Selik is still alive...?

63824.「……ちょっと 考えたいことがあるから\n 私 部屋に 戻ってますわね。\n 今:
I'm going back to my room for a while to do
some thinking. Thank you so much for your
help today.

63825.「……セレドの町へ来る道中 眠りから覚めて\n 治らないはずの病が 治ったと気づ:
I knew something was wrong ever since I woke
up and my incurable disease just vanished out
of nowhere...

63826.「僕の病気は いずれ死に至る 不治の病……。\n あまり 長く生きられないことは:
I already knew that my disease could not
be cured, and would eventually kill me... So
I didn't have much longer to live.

63827.「まあ 死んだことなんて どうでもいいさ。\n 立って歩くことも できなかった僕:
Well... I don't care if I'm really dead. I can
play the Torban here as much as I want,
without worrying about having to walk.

63828.「……練習に打ち込みたいから\n そろそろ ひとりにしてくれるかな？\n 見られ:
I'd like to practice some more, so do you
think you could leave? I can't focus well when
someone's watching me.

88924.<pc>たちは セリクの歓迎パーティーで\n楽しいひとときを 過ごした。:
<pc> had a great time at
Selik's welcome party.

99633.「今は 人と話す気分じゃないんだ。\n 悪いけど ひとりにしてくれるかな。:
I don't feel like talking to anyone right now.
I'm sorry, but could you leave me alone?

99634.「今は 人と話す気分じゃないんだ。\n 悪いけど ひとりにしてくれるかな。:
I don't feel like talking to anyone right now.
I'm sorry, but could you leave me alone?

99635.「それでも 私たちは息子に生きていてほしい。\n そんな思いから 評判の高い こ:
Still, we want our son to live. With this in
mind, we were on our way to this highly
reputed clinic...
